channel.title: Sport on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Sport on The Majority

item.title: A British Premiership? It's a match-winner
item.description: This article was originally published in Think Scotland. The biggest single thing that could be done to cement the union between Scotland and England would be for Celtic and Rangers to join The Premiership. I have pressed this case upon every Prime Minister since Tony Blair. You may say I have a taste for hyperbole from time to time. It is true I have sometimes hailed a starling as an eagle or even denounced a blackbird as a vulture but this time I'm not exaggerating.
